title: J's Pink Bikini
description: J has finally managed to get her sexy hunk of a husband on an airplane. She has always wanted to share her love of Mexico with him, and here is her chance. Their plan is to enjoy the sun, surf and each other until trouble comes to Paradise in the form of a frisky college student who is determined to catch Travis's eye. J will not let that happen, she will do whatever it takes to remind her husband exactly why he married her. Let the games begin. . .
author: Ryan O'Leary
